title: Receiving PMs re: buying accounts
body:
I'm receiving PMs from someone on my friends list in regards to buying lvl 30 accounts. 

Tried to log onto Riot support but the website seems to be down (at least the log in part is). Is there another way I can send in the evidence?

replies.body: Should be able to log in now!  Had a brief issue with the background system that supports the logins for our support site.
